name: IL_Outdoorsman
text: Never have a problem ordering, it’s getting it delivered. Literally this time around took 30 minutes for delivery. It’s only a problem with one driver and every time it’s that driver it takes forever and the food is cold by the time I get it.

name: Sally Watkins
text: Called 4 times. Placed on hold each time. Tried delivery and carry out both. If they don't have enough staff, they should close the doors. It is rude to be put on hold for 15 minutes. And told they can't handle the volume.

text: Was told my food was put out for delivery and didnt receive my food for 30 minutes and the only thing that wasnt cold was my soda …More

name: Jess B
text: Order quite a bit because I'm pregnant and love pizza hut right now. However this location just sucks. They get stuff wrong a lot. Leave stuff out of your order, food under cooked. When I got my free pizza with my points in was still charged for it and no one could tell me why. It was not cooked properly.

name: Kaylee Stuckwisch
text: Always delivers on time. Only problem-- I always order the "hut favorite" on the crust. First time it came without it: the husband said "give them a chance". I did.  I gave them 5 chances. Each time delivering online with the Hut Favorite …More

name: Elizabeth Carballosa
text: The service was great! Ask for Michelle, she was very kind and professional. She made our experience there that much better I wish. I'll ask for that server every time I go back!! Thanks for making my family and I feel at home Michelle!!!! You're the BEST server I've ever had!

name: Bobby Ford
text: All the boxes were crushed when I received the food and they didn't even give me a fork for the pasta and I'm staying in a hotel which you can tell from the address so thanks guys.

text:
Too greasy....The last time I was there, just greasy ,so much so we had to take napkins about 12 if them ! Way too many...
